headline: Ohio AG wants state pension funds to remove Russian assets
author: Associated Press
sentences: COLUMBUS — Ohio Attorney General Dave Yost is urging the state's five public employee retirement funds divest themselves of Russian financial holdings.
He also says Russian assets are likely to devalue, given the country’s growing isolation, and widespread bankruptcies could affect the pension funds.
Mike DeWine also called for the pension funds to divest themselves of Russian assets, as well as the state insurance fund for injured workers.
Yost says the move is to punish Russia over its invasion of Ukraine.
